wpPost.title: Sponsoring OMYC Platu Championship of Thailand 2022

seo.title: Sponsoring OMYC Platu Championship of Thailand 2022 - FLS
seo.metaDesc: FLS Group was proud to continue supporting our boat in the OMYC Platu Championship of Thailand 2022.
seo.opengraphTitle: Sponsoring OMYC Platu Championship of Thailand 2022 - FLS
seo.opengraphDescription: FLS Group was proud to continue supporting our boat in the OMYC Platu Championship of Thailand 2022.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: At FLS Group we love activities that are driven by team spirit, speed and excellence.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: Last month, we were proud to continue supporting our boat in the 𝗢𝗠𝗬𝗖 𝗣𝗹𝗮𝘁𝘂 𝗖𝗵𝗮𝗺𝗽𝗶𝗼𝗻𝘀𝗵𝗶𝗽 𝗼𝗳 𝗧𝗵𝗮𝗶𝗹𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝟮𝟬𝟮𝟮. In this tough and exciting race, the 𝗙𝗟𝗦-𝘀𝗽𝗼𝗻𝘀𝗼𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝗣𝗹𝗮𝘁𝘂 chased hard and overcame challenging conditions. Our newly formed post-pandemic crew, led by our trusted and experienced skipper, Doug Smith, managed to build on the teamwork as they strived to sail faster through each turn.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: We have some fascinating moments from the event for you to see and expect to progress in the upcoming events.
